files.patch: @@ -84,1 +84,1 @@ - * {@code 0x0001}. + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#PUBLIC}. @@ -93,1 +93,1 @@ - * value of {@code 0x0002}. + * value of {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#PRIVATE}. @@ -101,1 +101,1 @@ - * value of {@code 0x0004}. + * value of {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#PROTECTED}. @@ -109,1 +109,1 @@ - * {@code 0x0008}. + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#STATIC}. @@ -117,1 +117,1 @@ - * value of {@code 0x0010}. + * value of {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#FINAL}. @@ -146,1 +146,1 @@ - * a mask value of {@code 0x0020}. + * a mask value of {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#SYNCHRONIZED}. @@ -160,1 +160,1 @@ - * value of {@code 0x0040}. + * value of {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#VOLATILE}. @@ -174,1 +174,1 @@ - * mask value of {@code 0x0080}. + * mask value of {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#TRANSIENT}. @@ -187,2 +187,2 @@ - * modifier {@link Modifier#NATIVE native} with a mask value of {@code - * 0x0100}. + * modifier {@link Modifier#NATIVE native} with a mask value of + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#NATIVE}. @@ -203,1 +203,1 @@ - * value of {@code 0x0400}. + * value of {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#ABSTRACT}. @@ -211,1 +211,1 @@ - * {@code 0x0800}. + * {@value "0x%04x" Modifier#STRICT}.
